en.name: EOTech EXPS3 holographic sight cover (ECOT Splinter)
en.description: A Rubberized Cover for the EXPS3 series of holographic sights, this specific one painted with a unique Orange and Blue splinter camo.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST COG sight mount
en.description: The FAST COG Series Mount was developed to universally accept the Trijicon Combat Optical Gunsight double and triple screw interfaces.  It covers both ACOG and VCOG series scopes, placing the optical centerline at 2.05″ above the rail. Manufactured by Unity Tactical.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST COG sight mount (FDE)
en.description: The FAST COG Series Mount was developed to universally accept the Trijicon Combat Optical Gunsight double and triple screw interfaces. It covers both ACOG and VCOG series scopes, placing the optical centerline at 2.05″ above the rail. Manufactured by Unity Tactical. Flat Dark Earth version.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST Micro sight mount (Bronze)
en.description: The FAST™ Micro mount features built-in standard height back up iron sights that keep weapons uncluttered, without reducing capability. Designed for Aimpoint Micro (H1, H2, T1, T2, CompM5) and other optics with Aimpoint Micro footprint, such as those found on many Sig Sauer, Holosun, and Vortex Optics platforms.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST Micro sight mount (Green)
en.description: The FAST™ Micro mount features built-in standard height back up iron sights that keep weapons uncluttered, without reducing capability. Designed for Aimpoint Micro (H1, H2, T1, T2, CompM5) and other optics with Aimpoint Micro footprint, such as those found on many Sig Sauer, Holosun, and Vortex Optics platforms.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST Micro sight mount (White)
en.description: The FAST™ Micro mount features built-in standard height back up iron sights that keep weapons uncluttered, without reducing capability. Designed for Aimpoint Micro (H1, H2, T1, T2, CompM5) and other optics with Aimpoint Micro footprint, such as those found on many Sig Sauer, Holosun, and Vortex Optics platforms.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST MRDS sight mount
en.description: TThe FAST™ MRDS mount, in conjunction with the Optic Adapter Plates brings compatible micro red dot sights to the established FAST height of 2.26″ to optical centerline. Fits plates that allow the use of RMR, DeltaPoint, ACRO and 509T footprint optics. Manufactured by Unity Tactical.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST MRDS sight mount (FDE)
en.description: TThe FAST™ MRDS mount, in conjunction with the Optic Adapter Plates brings compatible micro red dot sights to the established FAST height of 2.26″ to optical centerline. Fits plates that allow the use of RMR, DeltaPoint, ACRO and 509T footprint optics. Manufactured by Unity Tactical. Flat Dark Earth version.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST MRDS ACRO baseplate
en.description: A custom baseplate designed for use with the Unity FAST MRDS optic riser, fits any ACRO footprint optics. Manufactured by Unity Tactical.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST MRDS DeltaPoint baseplate
en.description: A custom baseplate designed for use with the Unity FAST MRDS optic riser, fits any DeltaPoint footprint optics. Manufactured by Unity Tactical.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST MRDS 509T baseplate
en.description: A custom baseplate designed for use with the Unity FAST MRDS optic riser, fits any Holosun 509T footprint optics. Manufactured by Unity Tactical.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST MRDS RMR baseplate
en.description: A custom baseplate designed for use with the Unity FAST MRDS optic riser, fits any Trijicon RMR footprint optics. Manufactured by Unity Tactical.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST COMP-series scope mount
en.description: The Unity FAST Comp mount was developed as a solution for the DOD's standard issue M68 CCO

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST COMP-series scope mount (FDE)
en.description: The Unity FAST Comp mount was developed as a solution for the DOD's standard issue M68 CCO. Flat Dark Earth version.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST COMP-series scope mount (Bronze)
en.description: The Unity FAST Comp mount was developed as a solution for the DOD's standard issue M68 CCO. Bronze version.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST COMP-series scope mount (Green)
en.description: The Unity FAST Comp mount was developed as a solution for the DOD's standard issue M68 CCO. Green version.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST COMP-series scope mount (White)
en.description: The Unity FAST Comp mount was developed as a solution for the DOD's standard issue M68 CCO. White version.

en.name: Kastle Group FRT 226 scope mount
en.description: Precision-machined scope mount designed for secure optic placement on rifles with standard Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Kastle Group, the FRT 226 offers a low-profile, rock-solid lockup with dual clamping bolts and integrated recoil lugs.

en.name: Kastle Group FRT 226 scope mount (FDE)
en.description: Precision-machined scope mount designed for secure optic placement on rifles with standard Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Kastle Group, the FRT 226 offers a low-profile, rock-solid lockup with dual clamping bolts and integrated recoil lugs. Flat Dark Earth version.

en.name: Kastle Group FRT 226 scope mount (Sand)
en.description: Precision-machined scope mount designed for secure optic placement on rifles with standard Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Kastle Group, the FRT 226 offers a low-profile, rock-solid lockup with dual clamping bolts and integrated recoil lugs. Sand version.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST LPVO 30mm ring scope mount
en.description: A high-rise scope mount engineered by Unity Tactical for 30mm Low Power Variable Optics. Designed to elevate the optic to a faster, heads-up shooting posture, improving target transitions and situational awareness in dynamic engagements. Built from hard-anodized aluminum with reinforced clamping hardware.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST LPVO 30mm ring scope mount (FDE)
en.description: A high-rise scope mount engineered by Unity Tactical for 30mm Low Power Variable Optics. Designed to elevate the optic to a faster, heads-up shooting posture, improving target transitions and situational awareness in dynamic engagements. Built from hard-anodized aluminum with reinforced clamping hardware. Flat Dark Earth version.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST LPVO 30mm ring scope mount (Olive Drab)
en.description: A high-rise scope mount engineered by Unity Tactical for 30mm Low Power Variable Optics. Designed to elevate the optic to a faster, heads-up shooting posture, improving target transitions and situational awareness in dynamic engagements. Built from hard-anodized aluminum with reinforced clamping hardware. Olive Drab Green version.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST LPVO canted optic mount
en.description: A mount for the Unity Tactical FAST LPVO mount that allows for the installation of a canted optic as a backup sight.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST MRO sight mount
en.description: A mount designed by Unity Tactical to accept the Trijicon MRO anda similar footprint optics with a riser of around 2.05" of height over the muzzle.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST MRO sight mount (FDE)
en.description: A mount designed by Unity Tactical to accept the Trijicon MRO anda similar footprint optics with a riser of around 2.05" of height over the muzzle. Flat Dark Earth version.
